wikistories-extensiondesc: Wikistories lets editors create short, visual and reliable knowledge from Wikimedia projects
wikistories-specialcreatestory-nojswarni: This special page requires JavaScript to work
wikistories-article-info-banner: Select text to add it to your story
wikistories-article-info-expanded-banner: Tap and hold a word in the text then drag the sliders to highlight all text you want for your story. To add text tap add to story which shows at the bottom of screen.
wikistories-error-notenoughframes-messag: Wikistory needs at least {{PLURAL:$1|$1 page|$1 pages}}. Add {{PLURAL:$2|one more page|$2 more pages}} to publish.
wikistories-error-frameswithouttext-mess: {{PLURAL:$1|One story page is|$1 story pages are}} missing text. Add text to publish.
wikistories-builder-publishform-info: Published stories will be available on the article page.
wikistories-builder-publishform-invalidt: Another story with the same title already exist. Please write a unique story title.
wikistories-builder-publishform-saveerro: An error occured when publishing the story. Please try again later.
